page.title: 08FIRE SERVICE
page.content: Llandrindod fire station is a small fire station which only works part time.There are fourteen firemen,two fire engines,one fire landrover,one car and one snorkle. The biggest fire they had was at Newbridge Saw Mills. The area Llandrindod fire station covers is Little Mill, Llanbadarn, Forest Inn and Newbridge. The firemen carry little electronic instruments at all times these are called bleepers.When there is a fire the bleeper bleeps and the firemen leave their normal full time work and go to the fire station as quickly as possible.Last year the firemen were called out 103 times. .In big fires Llandrindod fire brigade joins up with Builth or Rhayader fire brigade.
